infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to record videos and take photos for posts and products.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone to record videos with audio.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select videos and images for posts and products.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow TokFlo to access your microphone to record videos with audio.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow TokFlo to access your camera to record videos and take photos.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow TokFlo to access your photos to select images and videos for posts.
